title.narrative: Enhancing cold water aquaculture sustainability via transfer of Finnish water saving and environmentally friendly technologies

description.narrative: Objectives: 1) To ensure that the RAS system in RCCAS is technically completed and viable serving sufficiently the industry needs and operating as a pilot/training center. 2) To provide technology and knowledge transfer to private farmers especially by tra ining newly establish farms owned and run by ethnic minorities in water saving and RAS technologies. 3) To establish relationships with Finnish companies providing RAS technology design and consultancy??Expected Results:1) About 1 500000 ? 2 000000 locally adapted and produced eggs/fingerlings/breeders are made available and supplied for private farmers annually.?2) RAS technology and farm management is being demonstrated to farmers interested in and capable of applying RAS in their own firm. 3) Concept pla ns for 2-3 companied/ private farm are selected as target of the project in Vietnam. ?Activities:1) The reliability and safety of the pilot/ demonstration RAS system is increased. 2)?Workshops of RAS knowledge and technology organized for private farmers. 3) Establishing/building relationships between local fish farmers and Finnish companies
